subject: Entrustment of stretches
text: 9rrrfy 7cfy TTJTHT uifadrut Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 Fax 91-11-25093507/25093514 (G Watt, 1am 4ia67 #r TNJTT +414) Extn_ 2223/2318/2468/2553 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Shipping; Road Transporl & Highways) G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/21/2002-Admn. 10, 2005 PQLICY MATTERS : TECHNICAL (51/2005) (Decision taken on File No. NHATOG/EMJ2004) Sub: Entrustment of Stretches: Ret: Circular No. 11041/21/2002-Admn dated 3* Feb 2004. 2 Ministry letter No. NH-14012/4/2005-P&M dated 23.03.2005, National Highways Authority %f India is mandated to implement National Highways Development Project (NHDP): The scope of NHDP is extended to improve more National Highways to 4/6-lane configuration. For implementation of NHDP by NHAI; entrustment of stretches covered under it to National Highways Authority %f India by the Ceniral Govemment Is imperative. entrustment of stretches to National Highways Authority of India by Ihe Central Government is also essential to avoid any legal complications  It has therefore , been desired by the Competent Authority that following procedures may be adopted for proposals related to entrustment of stretches: Technical Divisions will  identity the stretches for which notification entrasting the stretch to NHAI has not been published among the projects being implemented at present under NHDP as well as fresh stretches covered under extended NHDP to be entrusted to NHAI by the Central Government ii) Concemed Technical Division will process the dratt of the notification for entrustment of the above-mentioned   stretches and send the same to EM Division: iii) EM Division will be responsible for scrutinizing the preposal and processing the same through DoRTH to the Ministry &f for vetting and subsequent publication in the Otficial Gazette of India Extraordinary: GMY(EM) wilf beenodac officer for liaisoning with the Deptt of Road Transport; MoSRTH and the Legislative Deptt , Mo of Law for issue of such notifications  iv) Aiter publication of the notitication, the Concerned Technical Division will send a copy of it to EM Division of NHAI which in tumn would forward 100 ol the same to PeM of the (vinistry lo erlable urto  ay id fo Paaliamontcopies Contd_2h MHA May being Timely Law Wing
